Home → News → New library telephone numbers

New library telephone numbers

Written by James Powell · Published Jul 24, 2018

Several of our libraries have recently changed their telephone numbers:

  • Beccles Library
  • Brandon Library
  • Bury St Edmunds Library
  • Chantry Library
  • Felixstowe Library
  • Gainsborough Community Library
  • Haverhill Library
  • Ipswich County Library
  • Lowestoft Library
  • Sudbury Library
  • Woodbridge Library

The main number for Suffolk Libraries customer service or general enquiries is still 01473 351249.
